programme.title: SPM Top Tutor Mod Maths Ep07
programme.desc: Sets - Various terms and symbols are explained to enable students to answer past year questions on this topic.

programme.title: SPM Top Tutor Mod Maths Ep08
programme.desc: Trigonometry - Students are exposed to learn on how to find trigonometry ratio, solve all possible angles given the trigonometry ratio, and finally to sketch the curve.

programme.title: SPM Top Tutor Add Maths Ep07
programme.desc: Integration: In this episode, the opposite of differentiation is explained. Students are shown an example of integration followed by definite integration when the integral comes with limits.

programme.title: SPM Top Tutor Add Maths Ep08
programme.desc: Trigonometric Function. In this episode, trigonometrical ratio and how to prove a given identity and solve an equation is explained.

programme.title: SPM Top Tutor English Ep07
programme.desc: Paper 1: Section A about Directed Writing (Formal Letter). Focuses on format based on task word, how to plan the essay, how to expand the notes given and tips on style of language for a formal letter.

programme.title: SPM Top Tutor English Ep08
programme.desc: Paper 2: Section C: Summary Writing. Includes check list and techniques for Summary Writing, identifying points and what not to include in a summary.

programme.title: SPM Bahasa Melayu Ep17
programme.desc: Kertas 1 memfokus Karangan Tidak Berformat (Pendapat). Turut merangkumi contoh soalan, huraian jawapan, penjelasan dan tip-tip lain.

programme.title: SPM Bahasa Melayu Ep18
programme.desc: Kertas 2 memfokus strategi bagaimana untuk membina ayat yang tepat. Turut merangkumi contoh soalan, huraian jawapan, penjelasan dan tip-tip lain.

programme.title: SPM Top Tutor Bahasa Melayu Ep01
programme.desc: Menghadapi masalah untuk menulis rumusan yang mantap? Jangan khuatir - ikuti tunjuk ajar Cikgu Siti, Top Tutor Bahasa Malaysia anda. Dalam episod ini, Cikgu Siti menerangkan cara untuk menulis rumusan.

programme.title: SPM Top Tutor Bahasa Melayu Ep02
programme.desc: Cikgu Siti mengupas jenis-jenis peribahasa yang anda perlu tahu untuk menunjukkan Pengetahuan dan Kemahiran Bahasa anda. Saksikan episod ini untuk mengetahui teknik yang betul untuk menjawab soalan.

programme.title: SPM English Ep25
programme.desc: Focuses on directed writing. Join Lisa and Danny as they work-on exam questions based on these topics and discuss tips and how to avoid common errors.

programme.title: SPM English Ep01
programme.desc: Directed Writing in Paper 1. How to write informal letter This episode comes complete with questions, explanation and tips.

programme.title: SPM Top Tutor English Ep01
programme.desc: Section A of Paper 1:Directed Writing focusing on Report Writing. The report writing format, planning and expanding the notes are discussed in detail to help students score high marks in this section.

programme.desc: A case of stolen identity leads to hilarious events when a struggling actor and a hit man for hire swaps lives.

programme.title: Ode to My Father
programme.desc: Amid the time of Korean War, a young boy's vow to take care of his family marked the beginning of a lifelong promise spanning 60 years.

programme.title: The Pirates
